name: Cold-Beef-And-Lentil Salad
keywords: appetizer, main course, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, flank steak, lentils, watercress
recipeIngredient: 1 pound cold flank steak, cooked medium to medium-rare and cut into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lentils and the water in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer, partly covered, until the lentils are barely tender, about 20 to 25 minutes. Drain.
In a small bowl, combine the vinegar and white pepper. Add the olive oil in a steady stream, whisking constantly until the mixture is emulsified.
In a large serving bowl, toss together the steak, lentils, watercress, garlic, scallions, capers and sweet pickles with the dressing.
